scripts.e2e-test: docker build --target tester -t wowza-tester .; docker run wowza-tester | tee e2e-test.log
scripts.dev: docker build -t livepeerci/livepeer-wowza:death-to-hls-pull --target server . && docker run --rm -it --name livepeer-wowza -p 1935:1935 -p 8087:8087 -p 8088:8088 -v /Users/iameli:/Users/iameli -e WSE_LIC=$WSE_LIC livepeerci/livepeer-wowza:death-to-hls-pull /sbin/entrypoint.sh
